skmultiflow.filtering.base_transform module¶

class skmultiflow.filtering.base_transform.BaseTransform[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.core.base_object.BaseObject

Abstract class that explicits the constraints to all Transform objects in this framework.

This class should not be instantiated as it has no implementations and will raise NotImplementedErrors.

Raises:NotImplementedError: This is an abstract class.
get_class_type()[source]¶
get_info()[source]¶
partial_fit(X, y=None)[source]¶

Partial fit the Transformer object.

Parameters:
  • X (numpy.ndarray of shape (n_samples, n_features)) – The feature’s matrix.
  • y (Array-like) – An array-like with all the class labels from all samples in X.
Returns:

The partially fitted model.
Return type:

BaseTransform

Parameters:
